mainstream television, adds David Joseph - once a campaigner for the return of Top of The Pops. The BBC's commitment to music has been further weakened by the decision to axe the Electric Proms. I'm sad that the BBC has dropped such a great event as the Electric Proms. I hope they replace it with something brave and bold. We would love to see the return of a weekly show. The vice president joked that Donald Rumsfeld twice served as defense secretary and added that maybe if we give him a third term, he might get it right. Dick Cheney also drew laughs when he wondered aloud if Donald Rumsfeld may have more influence on Barack Obama than his current advisers.
